subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The 3-point shot, which was introduced in college basketball 25 years ago, has created players called Stretch 4s by some, a tall forward with the ability to shoot from outside and extend the defense.
snippet: The 3-point shot, which was introduced in college basketball 25 years ago, has created players called Stretch 4s by some, a tall forward with the ability to shoot from outside and extend the defense.
